report_metadata.search_strategy: Google Search + LinkedIn scraping via BrightData API

high_priority.title: Ajax Ontario Corporate Technology RFP
high_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Perfect match for comprehensive digital transformation - mobile apps, web platform, fan engagement, digital ticketing, analytics
high_priority.notes: Municipal RFP explicitly excludes physical construction/hardware, focuses purely on digital platforms

high_priority.title: Real Madrid-Softtek Digital Alliance Renewal
high_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Major partnership renewal for comprehensive digital services - proven track record with high-value contracts
high_priority.notes: Existing $5-10M EUR contract with Softtek expiring - renewal opportunity with established relationship

high_priority.title: Barcelona EU Digital Services Tender
high_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: EU-funded digital transformation project with substantial budget for sports digitalization
high_priority.notes: Digital Europe Programme funding - perfect for Yellow Panther digital transformation capabilities

high_priority.title: Galatasaray Delta3 Digital Platform Partnership
high_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Strategic partnership for comprehensive digital platform development
high_priority.notes: Partnership opportunity aligns perfectly with Yellow Panther core service offerings

high_priority.title: Celtic Digital Content Platform RFP
high_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Perfect match for streaming/OTT and mobile app capabilities
high_priority.notes: Digital content and streaming platform request - core Yellow Panther OTT service offering

medium_priority.title: Brighton & Hove Albion Digital Platform
medium_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Hiring surge indicates digital platform expansion - indirect opportunity
medium_priority.notes: Multiple senior tech roles hired indicates major digital investment - partnership opportunity

medium_priority.title: Fenerbahçe Marina Development Digital Infrastructure
medium_priority.yellow_panther_fit_analysis: Digital infrastructure component relevant to Yellow Panther capabilities
medium_priority.notes: Marina development includes significant digital infrastructure components

neo4j_integration.query_executed: MATCH (e:Entity) WHERE e.type IN ['Club','League','Federation','Tournament'] RETURN e.name, e.sport SKIP 300 LIMIT 300
